topics.body: So when Hero Academia inevitably gets an anime, what studio do you think is gonna get it? I really hope it isn't Toei or Pierrot. If I got to choose what studio would get the anime rights, I'd choose Bones. Those dudes are fucking amazing.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f732e063687234fcdd0200#post_54f732e063687234fcdd0200
*THE PEOPLE THAT ARE MAKING JOJO NEED TO GET TO MAKE THIS ANIME* 

~Unless that is Bones~
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f733506368723527540300#post_54f733506368723527540300
David Productions has Jojo and I believe their plate is full with it. Toei and Pierrot have this nasty habit of getting lazy with their animation. Toei being the one's responsible for the One Piece anime caused me no small amount of grief. Studio Pierrot were in charge of the Bleach and Naruto animes. Studio Bones are the ones who made RahXephon, Eureka Seven, Soul Eater, and Fullmetal Alchemist.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
